General.Name: Seahawk Gold Corp
General.Description: Seahawk Gold Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral resource properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for gold deposits. It holds 100% interests in the Mystery covering an area of 2,598 hectares; Touchdown covering an area of 2,484 hectares; Xtra Point covering an area of 56 hectares; and Blitz covering an area of 7,522 hectares located in the Urban-Barry Greenstone Belt region within the Abitibi sub-province, Quebec, Canada. The company was formerly known as Seahawk Ventures Inc. and changed its name to Seahawk Gold Corp. in September 2020. Seahawk Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Coquitlam, Canada.
General.Address: 909 Bowron Street, Coquitlam, BC, Canada, V3J 7W3

1.Name: Mr. Mitchell Ernest Lavery B.Sc. (Geol), P.Geo., PGeo
